page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF BLOCK
page.content: This block consists of a mixture of woodland,mainly plantations, and farmland, and it is split in two by the main A 380 road to Torbay, currently being improved. The higher land,above 200 metres approximately, is predominantly woodland on the poorer soils of Upper Greensand.Much of this woodland is in the form of coniferous plantations forming part of Exeter Forest.On the slopes below this greensand ridge,soils are better and the land use is a mixture of pasture and arable.Settlement consists of a number of scattered farms,and the small hamlet OF ASHCOMBE,population 117.There has been some depopulation of this area this century.There are no permanent shops or services.
